verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

After the doings<WH4639> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> wherein<WH834> you dwelled,<WH3427> shall you not do:<WH6213> and after the doings<WH4639> of the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> where<WH834> <WH8033> I bring<WH935> you, shall you not do:<WH6213> neither<WH3808> shall you walk<WH3212> in their ordinances.<WH2708>
You shall do<WH6213> my judgments,<WH4941> and keep<WH8104> my ordinances,<WH2708> to walk<WH3212> therein: I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
You shall therefore keep<WH8104> my statutes,<WH2708> and my judgments:<WH4941> which<WH834> if a man<WH120> do,<WH6213> he shall live<WH2425> in them: I am the LORD.<WH3068>
None<WH376> <WH3808> of you shall approach<WH7126> to any<WH376> that is near<WH7607> of kin<WH1320> to him, to uncover<WH1540> their nakedness:<WH6172> I am the LORD.<WH3068>

The nakedness<WH6172> of your father,<WH1> or the nakedness<WH6172> of your mother,<WH517> shall you not uncover:<WH1540> she is your mother;<WH517> you shall not uncover<WH1540> her nakedness.<WH6172>
The nakedness<WH6172> of your father's<WH1> wife<WH802> shall you not uncover:<WH1540> it is your father's<WH1> nakedness.<WH6172>

The nakedness<WH6172> of your sister,<WH269> the daughter<WH1323> of your father,<WH1> or<WH176> daughter<WH1323> of your mother,<WH517> whether she be born<WH4138> at home,<WH1004> or<WH176> born<WH4138> abroad,<WH2351> even their nakedness<WH6172> you shall not uncover.<WH1540>

The nakedness<WH6172> of your son's<WH1121> daughter,<WH1323> or<WH176> of your daughter's<WH1323> daughter,<WH1323> even their nakedness<WH6172> you shall not uncover:<WH1540> for theirs<WH2007> is your own nakedness.<WH6172>
The nakedness<WH6172> of your father's<WH1> wife's<WH802> daughter,<WH1323> begotten<WH4138> of your father,<WH1> she is your sister,<WH269> you shall not uncover<WH1540> her nakedness.<WH6172>
You shall not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of your father's<WH1> sister:<WH269> she is your father's<WH1> near<WH7607> kinswoman.<WH7607>
You shall not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of your mother's<WH517> sister:<WH269> for she is your mother's<WH517> near<WH7607> kinswoman.<WH7607>
You shall not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of your father's<WH1> brother,<WH251> you shall not approach<WH7126> to his wife:<WH802> she is your aunt.<WH1733>
You shall not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of your daughter<WH3618> in law:<WH3618> she is your son's<WH1121> wife;<WH802> you shall not uncover<WH1540> her nakedness.<WH6172>
You shall not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of your brother's<WH251> wife:<WH802> it is your brother's<WH251> nakedness.<WH6172>

You shall not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of a woman<WH802> and her daughter,<WH1323> neither<WH3808> shall you take<WH3947> her son's<WH1121> daughter,<WH1323> or her daughter's<WH1323> daughter,<WH1323> to uncover<WH1540> her nakedness;<WH6172> for they are her near<WH7608> kinswomen:<WH7608> it is wickedness.<WH2154>
Neither<WH3808> shall you take<WH3947> a wife<WH802> to her sister,<WH269> to vex<WH6887> her, to uncover<WH1540> her nakedness,<WH6172> beside<WH5921> the other in her life<WH2416> time.
Also you shall not approach<WH7126> to a woman<WH802> to uncover<WH1540> her nakedness,<WH6172> as long as she is put<WH5079> apart<WH5079> for her uncleanness.<WH2932>
Moreover you shall not lie<WH5414> <WH7903> carnally<WH7903> <WH2233> with your neighbor's<WH5997> wife,<WH802> to defile<WH2930> yourself with her.
And you shall not let any of your seed<WH2233> pass<WH5674> through the fire to Molech,<WH4432> neither<WH3808> shall you profane<WH2490> the name<WH8034> of your God:<WH430> I am the LORD.<WH3068>
You shall not lie<WH7901> with mankind,<WH2145> as with womankind:<WH802> it is abomination.<WH8441>

Neither<WH3808> shall you lie<WH5414> <WH7903> with any<WH3605> beast<WH929> to defile<WH2930> yourself therewith: neither<WH3808> shall any woman<WH802> stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> a beast<WH929> to lie<WH7250> down<WH7250> thereto: it is confusion.<WH8397>
Defile<WH2930> not you yourselves in any<WH3605> of these<WH428> things: for in all<WH3605> these<WH428> the nations<WH1471> are defiled<WH2930> which I cast<WH7971> out before<WH6440> you:

You shall therefore keep<WH8104> my statutes<WH2708> and my judgments,<WH4941> and shall not commit<WH6213> any<WH3605> of these<WH428> abominations;<WH8441> neither any of your own<WH249> nation,<WH249> nor any stranger<WH1616> that sojournes<WH1481> among<WH8432> you:
(For all<WH3605> these<WH411> abominations<WH8441> have the men<WH582> of the land<WH776> done,<WH6213> which<WH834> were before<WH6440> you, and the land<WH776> is defiled;<WH2930>)
That the land<WH776> spew<WH6958> not you out also, when you defile<WH2930> it, as it spewed<WH6958> out the nations<WH1471> that were before<WH6440> you.

For whoever<WH3605> <WH834> shall commit<WH6213> any<WH3605> of these<WH428> abominations,<WH8441> even the souls<WH5315> that commit<WH6213> them shall be cut<WH3772> off from among<WH7130> their people.<WH5971>

Therefore shall you keep<WH8104> my ordinance,<WH4931> that you commit<WH6213> not any one of these abominable<WH8441> customs,<WH2708> which<WH834> were committed<WH6213> before<WH6440> you, and that you defile<WH2930> not yourselves therein: I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
